transcendence

Class Exp

  • java.lang.Object
    • transcendence.Exp

  • public class Exp
extends Object
    Functions for calculating exponents.
    Author:
    Jon Hough

      Calculates an approximation for the number of primes less than X.
      static BigDecimal BigExp(BigDecimal D, BigDecimal exponent)
      Calculates D^exponent, where D and exponent are both BigDecimals.
      static BigDecimal BigExp(BigDecimal D, double exponent)
      Calculates D^exponent, for BigDecimal D.
      static BigDecimal exp(BigDecimal exponent)
      Calculates e^exponent, where e is the base of natural logarithms.

      Calculates the base^exponent.

      Calculates the natural logarithm of the BigDecimal X.
      static BigDecimal log10(BigDecimal X, int scale)
      Calculates the base 10 logarithm of BigDecimal X.

      • approxPrimesLessThan

        public static BigInteger approxPrimesLessThan(BigDecimal X)
        Calculates an approximation for the number of primes less than X. Approximation is X/Ln(X), asymptotic to pi(X). For small X, returned value is inaccurate.
        Parameters:
        X -
        Returns:
        approximation of pi(X)
